recommended_degree: Teknik Lingkungan, Teknik  Industri, Keselamatan Dan Kesehatan Kerja, Kesehatan Masyarakat (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will support the HSE team onsite in Gunung Putri across various health, safety, and environmental activities. This includes assisting in the development and reporting of SMK3, supporting the creation of technical HSE documents, and participating in safety patrols, safety training, and HSE programs. The intern will also help in planning, developing, and implementing risk management initiatives, conducting industrial HSE compliance audits, and supporting written and unwritten emergency response procedures. Additionally, the role involves assisting in system implementation and monitoring HSE operations at company work sites, maintaining strict HSE policies, collaborating with other departments to align HSE requirements with government regulations, and staying updated on the latest HSE policies and standards.
